ISSUE.TITLE: docker-compose up causes the cannot unmarshal number into Go struct field
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Describe the bug `docker-compose up` causes the following error. ``` Creating hummingbot ... error ERROR: for hummingbot Cannot create container for service hummingbot: invalid JSON: json: cannot unmarshal number into Go struct field LogConfig.HostConfig.LogConfig.Config of type string ERROR: for hummingbot Cannot create container for service hummingbot: invalid JSON: json: cannot unmarshal number into Go struct field LogConfig.HostConfig.LogConfig.Config of type string ERROR: Encountered errors while bringing up the project. ``` ### Steps to reproduce 1. Clone the repo 2. Checkout `development` branch. 3. `docker-compose up` ### Release version development@63f257c ### Type of installation Source ### Attach required files _No response_
